org.spongepowered.api

Interface Server

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ChannelRegistrar

    public interface Server
extends ChannelRegistrar
    Represents a typical Minecraft Server.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void broadcastMessage(Message message)
      Sends the given message to all online players.
      World createWorld(java.lang.String worldName)
      Creates a world using the default seed and generator from the server settings.
      World createWorld(java.lang.String worldName, WorldGenerator generator)
      Creates a world with the given generator but using the default seed from the server settings.
      World createWorld(java.lang.String worldName, WorldGenerator generator, long seed)
      Creates a new world with the given name and generator options.
      com.google.common.base.Optional<java.net.InetSocketAddress> getBoundAddress()
      Gets the bound InetSocketAddress this server is accepting connections from.
      int getMaxPlayers()
      Gets the max players allowed on this server.
      Message getMotd()
      Gets the default message that is displayed in the server list of the client.
      boolean getOnlineMode()
      Tests if this server is set to online mode.
      java.util.Collection<Player> getOnlinePlayers()
      Gets the Players currently online.
      com.google.common.base.Optional<Player> getPlayer(java.lang.String name)
      Gets a Player by their name
      com.google.common.base.Optional<Player> getPlayer(java.util.UUID uniqueId)
      Gets a Player by their unique id
      int getRunningTimeTicks()
      Gets the time, in ticks, since this server began running for the current session.
      com.google.common.base.Optional<World> getWorld(java.lang.String worldName)
      Gets a loaded World by name, if any.
      com.google.common.base.Optional<World> getWorld(java.util.UUID uniqueId)
      Gets a loaded World by its unique id (UUID), if any.
      java.util.Collection<World> getWorlds()
      Gets all currently loaded Worlds.
      boolean hasWhitelist()
      Tests if the server has a whitelist enabled.
      com.google.common.base.Optional<World> loadWorld(java.lang.String worldName)
      Loads a World from the default storage container.
      void setHasWhitelist(boolean enabled)
      Sets whether the server is utilizing a whitelist.
      void shutdown(Message kickMessage)
      Shuts down the server, and kicks all players with the given message.
      boolean unloadWorld(World world)
      Unloads a World, if there are any connected players in the given world then no operation will occur.

        getRegisteredChannels, registerChannel

    • Method Detail

      • getOnlinePlayers

        java.util.Collection<Player> getOnlinePlayers()
        Gets the Players currently online.
        Returns:
        A Collection of online players

      • getMaxPlayers

        int getMaxPlayers()
        Gets the max players allowed on this server.
        Returns:
        Maximum number of connected players

      • getPlayer

        com.google.common.base.Optional<Player> getPlayer(java.util.UUID uniqueId)
        Gets a Player by their unique id
        Parameters:
        uniqueId - The UUID to get the player from
        Returns:
        Player or Optional.absent() if not found

      • getPlayer

        com.google.common.base.Optional<Player> getPlayer(java.lang.String name)
        Gets a Player by their name

        This only works for online players.

        Note: Do not use names for persistent storage, the Notch of today may not be the Notch of yesterday.

        Parameters:
        name - The name to get the player from
        Returns:
        Player or Optional.absent() if not found

      • getWorlds

        java.util.Collection<World> getWorlds()
        Gets all currently loaded Worlds.
        Returns:
        Collection of loaded worlds

      • getWorld

        com.google.common.base.Optional<World> getWorld(java.util.UUID uniqueId)
        Gets a loaded World by its unique id (UUID), if any.
        Parameters:
        uniqueId - UUID to lookup
        Returns:
        The world, if found

      • getWorld

        com.google.common.base.Optional<World> getWorld(java.lang.String worldName)
        Gets a loaded World by name, if any.
        Parameters:
        worldName - Name to lookup
        Returns:
        The world, if found

      • loadWorld

        com.google.common.base.Optional<World> loadWorld(java.lang.String worldName)
        Loads a World from the default storage container.
        Parameters:
        worldName - The name to lookup
        Returns:
        the world, if found

      • unloadWorld

        boolean unloadWorld(World world)
        Unloads a World, if there are any connected players in the given world then no operation will occur.
        Parameters:
        world - The world to unload
        Returns:
        Whether the operation was successful

      • createWorld

        World createWorld(java.lang.String worldName,
                  WorldGenerator generator,
                  long seed)
        Creates a new world with the given name and generator options.

        If a world with the given name is already loaded then it is returned instead.

        Parameters:
        worldName - The new world name
        generator - The generator to generate the world with
        seed - The random seed for the world
        Returns:
        The new world

      • createWorld

        World createWorld(java.lang.String worldName,
                  WorldGenerator generator)
        Creates a world with the given generator but using the default seed from the server settings.

        If a world with the given name is already loaded then it is returned instead.

        Parameters:
        worldName - The new world name
        generator - The generator to generate the world with
        Returns:
        The new world

      • createWorld

        World createWorld(java.lang.String worldName)
        Creates a world using the default seed and generator from the server settings.

        If a world with the given name is already loaded then it is returned instead.

        Parameters:
        worldName - The new world name
        Returns:
        The new world

      • getRunningTimeTicks

        int getRunningTimeTicks()
        Gets the time, in ticks, since this server began running for the current session.

        This value is not persisted across server restarts, it is set to zero each time the server starts.

        Returns:
        The number of ticks since this server started running

      • broadcastMessage

        void broadcastMessage(Message message)
        Sends the given message to all online players.
        Parameters:
        message - The message to send

      • getBoundAddress

        com.google.common.base.Optional<java.net.InetSocketAddress> getBoundAddress()
        Gets the bound InetSocketAddress this server is accepting connections from.
        Returns:
        The address or Optional.absent() if not found

      • hasWhitelist

        boolean hasWhitelist()
        Tests if the server has a whitelist enabled.
        Returns:
        True if enabled, false if not

      • setHasWhitelist

        void setHasWhitelist(boolean enabled)
        Sets whether the server is utilizing a whitelist.
        Parameters:
        enabled - True to enable the whitelist, false to disable

      • getOnlineMode

        boolean getOnlineMode()
        Tests if this server is set to online mode. Online mode authenticates users against Minecraft's servers, false performs no validity checks.
        Returns:
        True if enabled, false if not

      • getMotd

        Message getMotd()
        Gets the default message that is displayed in the server list of the client.
        Returns:
        The server's default description (MOTD)

      • shutdown

        void shutdown(Message kickMessage)
        Shuts down the server, and kicks all players with the given message.
        Parameters:
        kickMessage - The message to kick players with
